name: A Zombie Head Free HD - Virus Plague Outbreak Run
name_original: A Zombie Head Free HD - Virus Plague Outbreak Run
description:
✭✭✭✭✭ INFECT THEM ALL! - Show No Mercy. ✭✭✭✭✭

YOU are Zombie Head a renegade Zombie intent on spreading the deadly virus.
How many puny humans can you infect before the whole town destroys you?

You begin your adventure as just a decapitated Zombie Head, bouncing along spitting
blood to infect your human foe. Collect Medi-Kits to regenerate your body parts
until you are an unstoppable Mega Zombie!

• Awesome cartoon style graphics
• Battle friends in online multiplayer - Be the last Zombie standing
• Compete on the Zombie leaderboard (courtesy of Game Center)
• Endless hours of fun
• Intuitive controls - just touch anywhere on the screen to move

Watch out for the Fast Farmer, Crazy Cop, Violent Vicar and many more mental towns people baying for your blood!

Download NOW while it's 100% free.
